none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2014-09-resistir-situacao/extracted/Resistir á Situação/06 Ninguém em Nome de Alguém
Resistir á Situação - Resistir á Situação demo 199?
Resistir á Situação - Resistir á Situação demo 199?

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on September 18, 2014 Description from Terminal Escape:
Aggressive (and manic) USHC influenced shit from Brasil. Burly as hell, and hooks galore without a hint of cheesy 'crew stuff in the mix. Equal parts '90s basement DIY and late '80s tough hardcore sounds like a combination I can get behind, and I get behind this. RESISTIR á SITUAÇÃO
//4.bp.blogspot.com/-pC7lBowWP34/VBpkvb3kxRI/AAAAAAAAKxc/TE5-RxHfClU/s1600/resistir%2Bcover.jpg
